Text: re Your FreeEDGAR ServiceCharlespst REMINDER NOTICE CHANGES TO YOUR FreeEDGAR SERVICE Starting in May both the FreeEDGAR Watchlist and RTF Downloading services became available only by subscription on our partner site EDGAR Online This is a reminder that you can reactivate your Watchlist immediately by upgrading to an EDGAR Online subscription Your FreeEDGAR Watchlist is still on file so you will NOT have to manually reinput any of your Watchlist data Plus you can download filings into Word search filings using multiple criteria and more Subscribing to EDGAR Online starts at just a month TO SUBSCRIBE now go to binfreeedgarjoinaspusername GROUP SUBSCRIPTIONS Have or more people who need SEC data EDGAR Online also offers Group Subscriptions CLICK HERE to find out more multiseatasp To restart your Watchlist now go to binfreeedgarjoinaspusername EDGAR Online offers advanced search tools and alerting services for the individual and professional user to get critical business and financial data from SEC filings fast You can call our Support team with any questions about upgrading to a subscription Call Monday through Friday am to pm ET or send an email to Sincerely Celine Duffy EDGAR Online Inc ATTENTION BROKERS EDGAR Online offers a softdollar payment option for subscription fees Select the Corporate Subscription option and enter the Accounts Payable Contact information of your softdollar provider for payment
